value:
Bathing together in the nude gets
people to open up... It's just one
benefit of visiting a hot spring.

I've always loved hot springs. Bathing
between battles is a habit of mine!

If you let the chill seep in, you won't
be as effective on the battlefield. You
should hop into a spring—right away!

I think my attire has you flustered!
You're so cute when you're
embarrassed.

My skin is so smooth...probably
because of the hot spring. Come
and look! I won't bite.

You should come and visit
$Nf's castle.
There's a great hot spring there!

The water's just perfect...and so's
my skin now.
I'm just getting warmed up!

I'm feeling a bit...woozy. I think I
soaked for a little too long...
I'm bursting with health! I can feel it...

Ready for a dip in a hot spring?
Come with me! Don't be shy!

That bath was so rejuvenating... I feel
completely refreshed, body and soul.$k$pJust as you'd care for your weapons,
you need to make sure to care for
your body, too.$k$pDo you know who I met in the bath?
A Hoshidan princess! She was
shocked to see me there.$k$pWhat an adorable little voice she
had! You know, next time I'll invite
Corrin and Elise along.$k$pI get the feeling you're hoping for an
invitation, too. I'll think about it!
Hee-hee.
ふぅ
はぁ
きゃああっ
だめっ
Time for a dip!
The water's fine!
Take a look!
No peeking!
The water's...gotten chilly...
ふぅん…
Join me for a dip in the hot spring?
Don't be in such a rush. Take a moment to relax and enjoy yourself.
This hot spring has me all heated up...
Nothing beats a cold drink after a hot dip.
Ohh, is it the hot water that's making you blush?
Ahhh... Hot springs feel so...wonderful...
Be a dear and...pass me a fresh towel?
Ahh, lovely!
How's the water?
To the hot spring!
